DOC.brief_summary: This prospective randomized study aim evaluate effectiveness periarticular multi-drug regimen injection relief pain patient undergo partial hip replacement . Total 258 patient randomized one two group ( groupC groupI ) base Excel number generation . Patients group C receive medication intraoperatively , patient group I receive oral oxycodone celecoxib preoperatively periarticular injection multi-drug regimen operation . Visual analogue scale pain score , fentanyl consumption frequency patient push button ( FPB ) patient-controlled analgesia system record 1 , 4 , 7 postoperative day .
DOC.brief_title: The Effect Periarticular Multi-Drug Regimen Pain After Partial Hip Replacement
DOC.detailed_description: Patients group I receive oxycodone SR 10 mg , celecoxib 200 mg 10 ml water 1 hour surgery . And patient group I receive periarticular injection 50 ml solution contain ropivacaine 15 mg , epinephrine 0.3 mg , cefmetazole 1000mg , ketorolac 30 mg morphine HCL 10mg closure surgical wound . Patients group C receive medication .
DOC.criteria: femoral neck fracture partial hip replacement r/o infection reoperation mental change
